title: ~ Problem With Connecting To League. Please Help ~
body:
Hello. A few months ago I was playing league fine without any problems. Then one day out of no where, I couldn't log in due to connection issues. I went online and look at every single post to help myself and I did everything, but for 3 days nothing worked. Then an answer on a Yahoo question helped me. Someone said to try using a VPN to connect to league. So I got Hotspot Shield to connect to League and since then I could. Whenever the VPN is off, I can't connect to it at all. 

So my question is, why can I only access league through a VPN and what can I do to fix it?

replies.body:
Since you were able to get logged in after using a VPN, my best assumption is that  your connection was getting blocked somewhere between your network and our game servers. We recently made a little video that does a really good job of explaining how these connections are made and what can go wrong in the process, which can be found [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LFNc04Xs0aw&feature=youtu.be)

If you have any other questions, feel free to hit me back up!

Is there a way I could unblock the connection between my network and your game servers?

If you're interested in why a VPN solved the issue for you it would be best to use our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to grab some logs, and submit those logs to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Our dedicated tech guys should be able to look through those logs shed more light on the situation!

Lemme know if you've got any other questions!
